tool.name: PHAnTASM Data Comparison
tool.description: Generate comparisons between two PHAnTASM datasets

param.label: Undefined value. For operations involving division, what should undefined results be set to? (e.g. 3/0 = ?).
param.name: positional_4

tool.help:
**What it does**
Given two datasets (often the same dataset):
::
#ID Val A 1 B 2 C 3
This tool will let you produce an NxM comparison of those datasets for use in the comarpison mapper. Multiple comparison methods are available, for example a multiplication method would produce the following:
::
#ID1 ID2 Val A A 1 A B 2 A C 3 B A 2 B B 4 B C 6 C A 3 C B 6 C C 9
**Comparison Methods**
(dist) absolute distance abs(a-b)
(pdiff) percent difference (a-b)/(a+b)
(bit_diff) # of different bits Values are converted to positive integers, and then the number of different bits in an XOR are counted
(phantasm_cids) CIDs Compare cassette IDs from CID generator tool
(texteq) Text equality 1 for identical, 0 for non-identical. Empty/"None" default to undefined value
